subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The rookie Andre Williams scored on a 3-yard run, and Odell Beckham Jr., a first-round draft choice who had been hampered by a hamstring injury, scored the go-ahead touchdown.
snippet: The rookie Andre Williams scored on a 3-yard run, and Odell Beckham Jr., a first-round draft choice who had been hampered by a hamstring injury, scored the go-ahead touchdown.
